TYRRHENIAN SEA.
CORSICA.
DNC 08.
1. HELICOPTER, ONE PERSON ON BOARD, MISSING.
   LAST KNOWN POSITION IN VICINITY 43-20N 009-50E.
   AT 221357Z JUL. VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 396 5908 4800, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2262/19.
